name: MLStyleTransfer.DataSource
desc: A data source for a style transfer model.

items.name: case images(styleImage: URL, contentDirectory: URL, processingOption: VNImageCropAndScaleOption?)
items.desc: The locations of a style-image file and content-image directory in the file system.

items.name: func processImages(textelDensity: Int, styleImageDestination: URL?, contentImagesDestination: URL?) -> (processedStyleImage: URL, processedContentImages: URL)
items.desc: Converts the content images to square images and saves them to a destination directory.
